author: rvs
msg: Working around peculiar layout of the Sqoop release tarball

author: kkolinko
msg: 1. Add explicit encoding header to sitemap.xml. The FAQ says that the encoding must be UTF-8.
2. Do not use priority values that are less than the default value of 0.5

author: todd
msg: HDFS-2948. NN throws NPE during shutdown if it fails to startup. Contributed by Todd Lipcon.

author: todd
msg: HADOOP-8070. Add a standalone benchmark for RPC call performance. Contributed by Todd Lipcon.

author: torsten
msg: - modperl_perl_core_global_init(), the aliasing GV references the aliased
CV. Thus, it should increment the REFCNT.
The bug has been there for years. Only starting with perl 5.14 it became
visible by messages like this in the error_log:
Attempt to free unreferenced scalar: SV 0x7fc218,
